channel.title: How do you link your downloaded source to your IP address?
channel.description: Does anyone know how? Im new at this stuff.. I would really appreciate it if someone could actually tell me how to do everything i should do, as in linking server to client, ip to client, ip to server, etc. All i have so far is a server with no source or client.. and i cant even get on to my server ><

item.title: How do you link your downloaded source to your IP address?
item.dc:creator: @Tree_Climber Tree_Climber
item.description:
@Tree_Climber wrote:

You just run the server and it will bind to port 43594(By default).

Read full topic
item.source: How do you link your downloaded source to your IP address?
